project.name: WebSee Source Intelligence MCP Server
project.description: MCP server providing frontend debugging intelligence with source map resolution, component inspection, network tracing, and bundle analysis

server.name: websee-mcp
server.description: Frontend debugging intelligence for browser automation

tools.name: debug_frontend_issue
tools.description: Debug frontend issues by analyzing components, network, and errors. Captures console logs, page errors, component state, and network activity.

tools.name: analyze_performance
tools.description: Analyze frontend performance including network requests, component rendering, bundle size, and memory usage. Supports interaction simulation.

tools.name: inspect_component_state
tools.description: Inspect the state, props, and structure of React/Vue/Angular components. Supports parent/child relationships.

tools.name: trace_network_requests
tools.description: Trace network requests and identify what code triggered them using stack traces. Filter by URL pattern and HTTP method.

tools.name: analyze_bundle_size
tools.description: Analyze JavaScript bundle size, identify large modules, and provide optimization recommendations.

tools.name: resolve_minified_error
tools.description: Resolve minified error stack traces to original source code using source maps. Provides full error context.

boundaries.description: This MCP server provides browser automation tools with source intelligence
scope: Network request tracing with source locations
Source map resolution for production code
limitations: Source maps must be available for full resolution
Browser must be accessible on the system
May require authentication for protected routes
